item.title: Getting started with stanford-nlp
item.description: Basic Setup from GitHub # This example goes over how to set up CoreNLP from the GitHub repo. The GitHub code has newer features than the official release, but may be unstable. This example will take you through downloading, building, and running a simple command-line invocation of CoreNLP. Prerequisites: Java 8 or newer. Apache Ant Git For the example: Bash or similar shell, and wget or curl Steps: Clone the CoreNLP Git repository:
